ygData.subject: Re: Zimel's Blades
ygData.msgSnippet: What if they just made all the stuff for all the quests no-drop?  Not just paladin quests but all quests.  I know there are casters out there who would like
ygData.messageBody:
What if they just made all the stuff for all the quests no-drop? Not just
paladin quests but all quests. I know there are casters out there who would
like the idea but then they can get money just like the rest of us do buy
looting mobs. Just a thought.

Sanben Trueblade
ECI
